posts.raw_content:
Use the government Leviathan the left has created against them. Ignore court orders. Terminate leftist staff. Seize assets and cut off funds from wealthy leftists. Incarcerate known agitators. Get warrants (or not) to monitor leftist groups and leaders. Label antifa, BLM, the tides foundation, code pink, and other groups terrorist organizations. Seize the means of terror the same way they would seize the means of government and production. Hang them out to dry and expose them to the public for what they are. Draw them out, scoop them up, and detain them to protect the Republic.

You see, if there is no response beyond hearings and strongly worded letters, then the left will be emboldened. There will be more death and violence. And the longer the right refuses to mount a swift, peaceful response, the closer we get to spinning out of control and vigilantes taking matters into their own hands.

We need President Truml to get up off the floor and fight. They tried to assassinate DJT twice. They tried to put him in jail. They raided his home. There is no person in the history of our nation that has experienced these things and lived through it. And there is no other person who has been given such a mandate by the voters and God Himself to do what is necessary to save America.
